section_1.title: Integrated Logistics Solutions, Tailored to Your Business
paragraphs: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand that every freight has a story and every delivery is critical to the success of your business. That is why we don't just offer transport services, but build strategic partnerships based on trust, performance, and a deep understanding of the logistics chain.

With an approach focused on innovation and an extensive network of validated partners, we transform logistics challenges into opportunities for growth. Whether you need fast transport, management of special goods, or a complex multimodal solution, our dedicated team is here to ensure your freight reaches its destination under optimal conditions, on time, and at a fair cost. Explore our complete range of solutions and discover how we can bring efficiency and predictability to your operations.

section_1.title: CLS: YOUR RELIABLE PARTNER IN ROAD TRANSPORT
paragraphs: Crystal Logistics Services offers complete freight transport services, adapted to the requirements of each client. With a modern and diversified fleet, we ensure safe and efficient road transport both nationally and internationally.
Through our experience in road freight transport, we guarantee flexible solutions, on-time delivery, and the highest safety standards. Choose a reliable partner for any type of transport!

section_2.title: Solutions for any type of cargo
paragraphs: Regardless of your needs, we have personalized solutions:
listItems: International transport and domestic transport, with extensive coverage across Europe
Reefer transport, intended for perishable goods and temperature-sensitive products

section_3.title: Domestic and International Transport
section_3.subtitle: At Crystal Logistics Services, we offer a wide range of services to face any logistical challenge you might encounter. We pride ourselves on being a reliable partner for road transport, both nationally and internationally.
paragraphs: In the field of road transport, we pride ourselves on our ability to transport a diverse range of goods on domestic and international routes. We can successfully manage international road freight transport for a variety of products, from food to industrial equipment and consumer goods.
Furthermore, our experience allows us to easily manage the transport of hazardous materials or other special loads, strengthening our position in the international and domestic road transport sector.

section_4.title: WE OVERCOME TRANSPORT CHALLENGES WITH SMART SOLUTIONS
paragraphs: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand that every transport project has its own challenges. In this regard, flexibility and adaptability are two of our fundamental principles. We constantly adapt to the specific requirements of each client, offering personalized solutions that overcome any obstacles. Regardless of the type of cargo you wish to transport, we are here to help you.

Accordion.title: Freight transport legislation
Accordion.intro: Under what conditions is the transport of goods carried out?

class1.title: Public road freight transport
class1.short: can be carried out by transport operators only by meeting certain conditions, including possessing the necessary documents:
listItems: certified copy of the transport license (ARR licenses and ARR certified copies);
transport document, so you can justify the transport before the State Inspectorate for Road Transport Control;
certificate regarding the vehicle's compliance with pollution and road safety standards;
international transport authorization (only for international transport).

class2.title: Romanian road transport operators can perform public road freight transport in international traffic:
listItems: only based on international transport authorizations issued by the competent authority;
in compliance with international agreements or conventions to which Romania is a party.

class3.title: Documents required for own account road transport:
listItems: certified copy of the own account transport certificate (ARR certified copies);
documents proving that the cargo is transported on own account.

messages: For more information about road transport and each sub-service, click on the links above or contact us directly to discuss with one of our specialists!

section_1.title: WE HAVE EXPERTISE IN HANDLING EXCEPTIONAL DIMENSION CARGO
paragraphs: When you have a load that does not fit the standard dimensions of a truck or exceeds the maximum admissible weight, you need experts.
At Crystal Logistics Services, we have the experience and resources necessary to successfully manage these complex tasks, through our international and domestic oversized transport services.

section_2.title: OUR EXPERIENCE
paragraphs: We have accumulated vast experience in the field of oversized transport, having the ability to successfully manage the transport of exceptional dimension cargo from various fields.

From agricultural machinery, industrial equipment, construction and infrastructure, to renewable energy equipment and complex metal structures, we have addressed a diversity of requests, each with its unique challenges, thus strengthening our expertise.

section_3.title: AREAS OF EXPERTISE
listItems: Agricultural Machinery: From combines to water tanks.
Construction and Infrastructure: Excavators, cranes, drilling rigs, and many more.
Energy: Wind turbines and other energy equipment.
Transport: Wagons, boats, and aircraft.
Modular Constructions: Mobile homes and modular structures.
Metal Structures: Of various sizes and applications.
Long Cargo: Pipes of various sizes.
Military Equipment: Specific vehicles and machinery.

highlight.title: WHY CHOOSE CRYSTAL LOGISTICS SERVICES FOR OVERSIZED TRANSPORT?

card1.title: Rigorous Planning and Organization
card1.description: At Crystal Logistics, we understand that the key to successful oversized transport is rigorous planning and impeccable organization. As an oversized transport company with vast experience in the field, we know how important it is to evaluate the road infrastructure and identify potential obstacles before starting the transport. We know that the dimensions and weight of the load may require specific routes that can support these specifications. That's why choosing the most efficient route is a priority for us. In oversized transport and bulk cargo transport, encountering challenges is a norm, not an exception. Physical obstacles on the route or transit restrictions are just some of the challenges we regularly face. However, at Crystal Logistics Services, these challenges are anticipated, managed, and overcome successfully thanks to the professionalism and seriousness of our team.

card2.title: Authorizations, Approvals, and Escort
card2.description: We understand the complexity of the oversized transport process and know how important it is to comply with current legislation. Obtaining the necessary authorizations and approvals for oversized transport can be a challenge, but we take care of everything. We ensure transport licenses, ARR licenses, authorizations, and all necessary approvals for transport. We also offer escort with authorized escort vehicles, guaranteeing the safety of the transfer throughout the route. For ADR transport, we offer safe and compliant solutions, having ADR certification, drivers specialized in hazardous materials transport, and specialized vehicles. Furthermore, you can benefit from specialized consultation from our safety advisor.

card3.title: All-Inclusive
card3.description: Oversized transport represents much more than simply moving an object from point A to point B. That's why we offer all-inclusive services, from rigorous planning of the transport process, to obtaining all necessary authorizations and approvals, as well as providing escort and security services. We use a varied range of specialized vehicles, adapted for this type of transport. These are essential for an efficient and safe delivery of oversized goods. Whether it's low-bed trucks, modular trailers, or vehicles with high loading capacities, we have the right solution for your needs.

specializedVehicles.title: SPECIALIZED VEHICLES
specializedVehicles.intro: We use a varied range of vehicles adapted for oversized transport: flatbed trailers, lowbed trailers, extendable trailers, and multi-axle trailers for high tonnage.

Header.title: ADR TRANSPORT
Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: CHOOSE THE SAFE ROUTE – ADR HAZARDOUS MATERIALS TRANSPORT
paragraphs: The transport of ADR hazardous materials represents a major challenge.
At Crystal Logistics Services, we specialize in managing these transports, ensuring your goods are handled and delivered under maximum safety conditions.
Our team consists of qualified specialists, continuously trained in accordance with ADR regulations.

section_2.title: PACKAGING OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS AND MARKING OF PACKAGES
introParagraphs: Hazardous substances are classified and grouped according to ADR (European Agreement concerning the International Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Road), based on their degree of hazard. This detailed classification, in accordance with ADR legislation for packages, helps us understand the specific requirements for appropriate packaging for each type of cargo.
For packaging purposes, any prescription related to the performance level is provided in the applicable packaging instruction.
outroParagraphs: Packaging must be designed and constructed to withstand transport conditions and prevent any leaks or damage. Furthermore, packaging must be subjected to rigorous tests to verify compliance with the requirements specified by ADR regulations.

section_3.title: SAFETY – OUR NUMBER ONE PRIORITY
paragraphs: In the field of hazardous materials transport, safety is not just a priority, but a necessity. Non-compliance with safety regulations leads not only to considerable fines but also to potential accidents with disastrous consequences. That's why Crystal Logistics Services holds a hazardous materials transport license, ensuring that every transport is carried out under optimal security conditions.

You can benefit from the services of a specialized safety advisor, whose main responsibility is to ensure that all safety regulations are respected. Moreover, our drivers are trained and examined to ensure they can safely and efficiently handle hazardous materials. The trucks are also inspected and certified to guarantee they are properly equipped for the transport of this type of goods.

highlight.title: CHOOSE THE IDEAL TRANSPORT SOLUTION!
highlight.description: Every client has specific needs when it comes to transporting ADR hazardous materials. Therefore, we offer two main solutions: groupage transport (LTL) and exclusive transport (FTL).

card1.title: Groupage Transport (LTL)
card1.description: Groupage transport (LTL) is ideal for those who have smaller quantities of ADR hazardous materials to transport. This solution involves combining multiple loads into a single truck, making the process more cost-effective. Additionally, for those dealing with ADR transport that requires temperature control, we offer refrigerated transport options, with containers equipped with dividing walls, to ensure optimal transport conditions.

card2.title: Exclusive Transport (FTL)
card2.description: Exclusive transport (FTL) is the right solution for those who have large quantities of goods or high-value goods. In this case, the entire truck is reserved for a single load, offering a higher level of control and flexibility.

cards.title: WE HAVE MULTIPLE TYPES OF TRUCKS FOR ADR TRANSPORT
cards.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the complexity and risks associated with the transport of ADR hazardous materials. That's why we have invested in a varied fleet of specialized ADR trucks, designed to meet your requirements for safely shipping these goods.

card1.title: TARPAULIN TRUCKS
descriptions: These constitute an optimal solution for the transport of ADR hazardous materials, being ideal for the transport of palletized or boxed goods, due to the fact that they offer protection against bad weather and ensure easy access for loading and unloading.

card2.title: BOX TRUCKS
descriptions: With a solid and robust structure, these trucks are manufactured considering the need to transport sensitive and hazardous cargo. Their body is designed to resist any type of shock or impact, thus protecting the load.

card3.title: TANKERS
card3.short: For hazardous liquids, gases, and powders.
descriptions: We understand that the ADR transport of hazardous materials is a complex and delicate operation. That's why we have invested in a varied fleet of specialized tankers, to ensure we can meet any transport need. Tankers are ideal for the transport of liquids, gases, and powders. Our fleet is equipped with specific equipment, so we can ensure transport in the safest way possible.

Header.title: REEFER TRANSPORT
Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: DO YOU NEED REFRIGERATED FREIGHT TRANSPORT?
paragraphs: We offer high-quality refrigerated transport services, with a fleet adapted to ensure the best transport conditions for refrigerated or frozen goods.
Crystal Logistics Services offers you personalized and efficient solutions, adapted to the specific needs of your business.

section_2.title: What types of goods do we transport?
paragraphs: At Crystal Logistics Services, we can transport a wide range of goods, continuously adapting to the requirements and needs of our clients.
We offer international refrigerated transport solutions for a variety of products:
listItems: medicines: controlled temperature +2/+8°C | +15/+25°C;
frozen goods (fish, meat, vegetables, ready-meals, etc.): -18/-20°C. The set temperature is controlled and constant throughout the transport;
refrigerated goods (vegetables, fruits, fresh meat, flowers, etc.): 0°C/+6°C.

col1.title: PERSONALIZED SUPPORT FOR REFRIGERATED TRANSPORT
paragraphs: We understand the complexity and stress associated with refrigerated transport in Romania, which is why we offer personalized professional consulting to ensure a smooth and efficient experience.

Our experienced consultants will guide you from the beginning, offering advice and assistance at every stage of planning, from choosing the optimal transport temperature to selecting the right vehicle and complying with strict regulations in the field.

col2.title: EXPERTS IN REFRIGERATED TRANSPORT
paragraphs: Detailed knowledge of temperature requirements for different types of products, as well as the ability to manage problems that may arise during transport, make us a reliable partner in the road transport of perishable goods.
For these reasons, we are the right choice for all your refrigerated transport needs.

highlight.title: WHY COLLABORATE WITH US FOR REFRIGERATED TRANSPORT?
highlight.description: Our vast experience and specialized knowledge in refrigerated freight transport allow us to offer the best possible service.

card1.title: Adaptable Vehicles
card1.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we have focused on creating an adaptable fleet, capable of responding efficiently to any type of transport needs. From sprinter vans for short distances and fast deliveries to new refrigerated vans and large tonnage trucks for voluminous goods transport or long distances, every vehicle in our fleet is ready to meet your transport needs. All our vehicles are equipped with temperature regulation systems, capable of maintaining a controlled climate in the range from -20°C to +25°C.

card2.title: Temperature Certification
card2.description: In the field of international and domestic refrigerated transport, at Crystal Logistics Services we pride ourselves on strict compliance, allowing us to precisely monitor temperature variations throughout the transit duration. In this way, we maintain temperature constancy and guarantee that goods reach their destination in optimal conditions.

card3.title: Flexibility and Adaptability
card3.description: We understand that every business is unique and has specific requirements. This is why we offer a wide range of options, including groupage refrigerated transport contracts, with the help of our containers equipped with dividing walls. These allow for separate transport of goods and maintaining a specific temperature for each type of product. Thus, we can transport products requiring different temperatures simultaneously, without compromising their quality or safety.

card1.title: Insulated transport vehicles
card1.short: For short distances and goods with low perishability.
descriptions: Vehicles with thermally insulated walls, without their own cooling unit, ideal for short-distance transport of goods with low perishability.
Maintain stable internal temperature for a limited time.

card2.title: TANKER TRUCKS
card2.short: For food liquids at controlled temperature.
descriptions: Specialized tankers for food liquids (e.g., milk, juices), with insulation and systems for maintaining the preset temperature.
Allow easy washing and sanitization to comply with food safety standards.

card3.title: REFRIGERATING TRANSPORT VEHICLES
card3.short: For products requiring very low temperatures.
descriptions: Vehicles equipped with temperature-controlled cooling units, suitable for frozen or ultra-refrigerated products.
Maintain the set climate throughout the transport, including in international regimes.

cta.title: For more details, quotes, or any other information, do not hesitate to contact us.

Header.title: BULK CARGO TRANSPORT
Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: COMPLETE SOLUTIONS FOR BULK CARGO TRANSPORT
paragraphs: At Crystal Logistics Services, we offer complete transport solutions for your bulk cargo, tailored to your specific needs. We understand that every transport task has unique requirements, and our solutions are designed to meet these requirements efficiently and safely.

Our fleet of tipper trucks is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and specially adapted for bulk road freight transport. Our trucks can transport a wide range of goods, from grains and building materials to waste. They are regularly checked and maintained to ensure they are in optimal working condition.

section_2.title: OUR TEAM – READY TO HELP YOU
paragraphs: With extensive experience in this sector, our professionals know in detail the rules and regulations related to freight transport and the particularities of different types of bulk cargo. This allows us to deliver high-quality services and offer personalized solutions that truly correspond to the needs of each client.
Consulting and support are two key aspects of our services. Our team offers consulting and support throughout the entire bulk freight transport process.

This includes recommendations for the most efficient way to transport the cargo, advice on how to package and prepare the cargo for transport, as well as assistance with the necessary documentation. We make sure we take all details into account to ensure a smooth transport.

highlight.title: WHY CHOOSE OUR BULK CARGO TRANSPORT SERVICES

card1.title: SPECIALIZED TIPPER TRUCKS FOR BULK CARGO
description: At Crystal Logistics, we know the importance of efficient and safe transport of bulk cargo. Our tipper trucks are specialized, capable of withstanding difficult conditions.
The tipping system has also been designed to facilitate the loading and unloading of goods, thus saving time and resources.

card2.title: FAST LOADING AND UNLOADING
description: At Crystal Logistics, we understand your need for efficiency and speed in any transport operation.
For this reason, the tipping system of our trucks is designed to speed up the loading and unloading process, thus saving valuable time and resources.

card3.title: BULK CARGO TRANSPORT ADAPTED TO YOUR NEEDS
description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we are dedicated to offering you bulk cargo transport solutions tailored to the specific needs of your business.

We understand that every client is unique and has different requirements, which is why we offer a personalized bulk cargo transport service. Whether it's grains, building materials, or chemical products, we will find the optimal transport solution to fit your needs.

card4.title: TRANSPORT SAFETY
description: At Crystal Logistics Services, safety is always first. We understand that the transport of bulk cargo requires special attention, which is why we systematically invest in the overhaul and maintenance of our trucks.
All our vehicles are subjected to rigorous periodic checks to ensure they are in optimal working condition and ready to take on any task.
From the engine to the braking system, every component of the truck is checked to ensure everything is functioning correctly and safely for bulk cargo transport.

card5.title: WE TRANSPORT ANY TYPE OF BULK CARGO
description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we provide you with a complete range of bulk cargo transport services, adapted to your specific needs.

We have a modern fleet of special trucks with a capacity from 35-40 cubic meters up to 90 cubic meters (rolling gantry), which allow us to efficiently transport a variety of bulk cargo, including grains, aggregates, waste, construction materials, and many others.

Our tipper trucks are equipped to handle any challenge. Depending on the type of bulk cargo you wish to transport, we can adapt our transport methods to best suit your requirements. We provide you with domestic and international freight transport.

Accordion.title: What you need to know about bulk cargo transport
Accordion.intro: The road transport of bulk cargo, such as grains, sawdust, coal, or certain food products, requires special attention from logistics experts and freight forwarding companies for domestic and international transport.

class1.title: Specific information about the cargo and risk anticipation
paragraphs: Are essential for optimal route and equipment planning, reducing empty runs and allowing quick reactions to unforeseen events.

class2.title: The complexity of transport
paragraphs: Is given by the diversity of goods, the strict transport conditions, the specialized infrastructure required, the dedicated logistical procedures, and the supplementary resources involved.

class3.title: Promptness and safety
paragraphs: Are essential for clients, especially for sensitive goods. Operators offering freight transport intermediation often provide complex services that include both transport and logistical management.

class4.title: The type of vehicle used
paragraphs: Must correspond to the type of cargo transported and comply with legal regulations. Rigorous sanitization is essential to avoid contamination.

class5.title: The transport of food products
paragraphs: Is regulated at the European level, specifying the transport conditions and vehicle requirements.

class6.title: Cleaning, disinfection, and complete drying
paragraphs: Cleaning, disinfection, and complete drying of vehicles are mandatory after each transport, in accordance with client requirements.

cta.title: Choose Crystal Logistics Services for worry-free bulk transport!
messages: Benefit from personalized solutions for every transport task! Our team of professionals is always at your disposal to offer you consulting and assistance. For any question or request, do not hesitate to contact us!

Interaction with a variety of requirements and situations has allowed us to adapt and perfect our skills, to be able to offer personalized solutions to each client.

paragraphs: If you have decided that you need a car transport service on a platform, then Crystal Logistics Services is the ideal partner for you. We accept a wide range of vehicles, including luxury cars, classic vehicles, or car fleets for auto exhibitions or events.
With us, your vehicle will reach its destination safely and on time.

section_3.title: WHY CHOOSE CRYSTAL LOGISTICS SERVICES
paragraphs: We are proud of the reputation we have built over time, through dedication and hard work. Our network of satisfied clients is a clear proof of our constant commitment to excellence. The positive feedback we constantly receive from our clients not only motivates us but also confirms that we are a reliable partner in car transport.

highlight.title: Adapted Platforms
highlight.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand that every vehicle has unique transport needs, which is why we offer a variety of platform types to meet all requirements. We know that not all vehicles are created equal and that some may have special loading and unloading needs. That's why our transport platforms can be adapted to fulfill various needs.

card1.title: Open or Covered Platforms
description: Open platforms: ideal for transporting luxury vehicles, offering increased visibility and optimal ventilation.
Covered platforms: offer supplementary protection against bad weather and damage, being perfect for transporting sensitive vehicles.

card2.title: Varied Capacity
description: Single-position platforms: ideal for transporting a single vehicle, offering excellent maneuverability and fast loading/unloading.
8-9 position platforms: ideal for transporting fleets of vehicles or larger vehicles.

card3.title: Platform Transport for Commercial Vehicles, Machinery, and Oversized
description: In addition to car transport, the Crystal Logistics forwarding company offers personalized solutions for transporting commercial vehicles, machinery, and oversized vehicles (which exceed standard dimensions/tonnage). Our team of experts will carefully analyze the specifications of your transport and recommend the optimal platform to ensure the safety and efficiency of the operation.

cards.title: Characteristics of our car transport services
cards.description: We understand that every client has specific needs and, therefore, we offer car transport solutions on platforms that can be adapted to fit these requirements. Whether it's time, location, or the type of vehicle to be transported, our team is ready to offer you the best solutions.

card1.title: Safety First
descriptions: We have developed a set of rigorous security procedures for the transport of cars from abroad. We use the most advanced securing devices in the industry to secure the vehicles on our transport platforms. All our securing devices are designed to prevent vehicle movement during transport, substantially reducing the risk of damage.

card2.title: Extended Geographical Coverage
descriptions: Our car transport services cover a wide range of locations, both nationally and internationally. We offer vehicle transport in numerous countries and regions, without significant geographical limitations.

card3.title: Comprehensive Insurance
descriptions: All our car transports are covered by insurance, giving you the peace of mind you need.

cta.title: Contact us today to get an offer for car transport!

Our team of professionals is always ready to answer your questions and offer you the best car transport solutions.

Header.title: DOMESTIC AND INTERNATIONAL TRANSPORT
Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: Domestic and International Transport for All Types of Loads
paragraphs: Our vehicle fleet is one of the most diversified on the market, designed to meet a wide range of needs in transport and logistics.
From various sized trucks, to oversized trailers and tipper semi-trailer trucks, we have solutions for any type of load.
At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the complexity and diversity of the transport and logistics market, and the varied range of cargo we manage reflects this.

section_2.title: SAFETY – OUR NUMBER ONE PRIORITY
paragraphs: Transport safety is a fundamental pillar for us.
Every vehicle in our fleet is well-maintained, regularly inspected, and driven by experienced crews, thus guaranteeing that your goods arrive at their destination in the best conditions.

fleetMini.title: LIGHTWEIGHT FLEET
fleetMini.description: Choose from multiple compact vehicles — ideal for urban distribution and fast deliveries.

sprinter.title: Sprinter Tarpaulin/Box (MMA 3.5T)
sprinter.description: This compact yet powerful vehicle is ideal for transporting general cargo, such as parcels or consumer goods. With a loading capacity of 3.5 tons, this vehicle is perfect for fast deliveries in urban areas or over shorter distances. We hold transport licenses for 3.5 tons.

van75.title: Tarpaulin/Box Van (MMA 7.5T)
van75.description: A higher capacity vehicle, suitable for transporting heavier or more voluminous goods. It can transport a variety of cargo, from industrial equipment to construction materials. The advantage of this type of vehicle is its ability to enter more difficult-to-access areas and make efficient deliveries over medium distances.

van10.title: Tarpaulin/Box Truck (MMA 7.5-40T)
van10.description: It is the strongest link in our vehicle chain. With a loading capacity of up to 40 tons, this truck is intended for transporting heavy and voluminous goods over long distances. Due to its dimensions, it can transport oversized, bulk cargo, or containers, under maximum safety conditions.

marfa_generala.title: General Cargo
marfa_generala.description: General cargo includes those products that are not subject to special transport regimes. Whether it is electronics, textiles, food products, or any other good that does not require specific conditions, we ensure that every item arrives at its destination in perfect condition.
marfa_generala.imageAlt: Pallets with cargo in a warehouse

agabaritic.title: Oversized Trailer
agabaritic.description: In the world of transport and logistics, oversized trailers are key elements in carrying out complex operations. We use these trailers to transport cargo that exceeds standard dimensions and weights. Whether it's massive machinery, industrial structures, or large-sized equipment, they are transported with the utmost safety and efficiency. The oversized trailers we use are equipped with the latest safety equipment and have a robust construction to ensure safe and efficient transport. They can be adapted to fit different types of cargo, and their loading capacity is impressive.
agabaritic.imageAlt: Refrigerated truck unloading cargo at the ramp

marafa_agabaritica.title: Oversized Cargo
marafa_agabaritica.description: The processing of oversized cargo begins with a thorough analysis of its dimensions and weight, in order to determine the necessary equipment and optimal route. This is followed by preparing the cargo for transport, a stage that includes packaging and securing it for transport. The actual transport is carried out with the help of special equipment and vehicles, capable of supporting heavy weights and managing impressive dimensions. If the route requires passing through difficult-to-access areas, special convoys may even be used. Finally, the cargo is delivered to the destination, in accordance with the legislation for oversized transport, where it is unloaded using appropriate equipment.
marafa_agabaritica.imageAlt: Oversized trailer loaded with heavy machinery

camion_cu_semiremorca_basculabila.title: Tipper Semi-trailer Truck
camion_cu_semiremorca_basculabila.description: These are ideal for transporting solid materials such as sand, grains, or waste, due to their specialized design that allows for quick and efficient unloading of goods. Thus, these trucks become a practical and efficient solution for various transport tasks.

marfa_vrac_basculanta.title: Bulk Cargo – Tipper
marfa_vrac_basculanta.description: Bulk cargo transport with a tipper is used especially for transporting solid products, such as grains, minerals, or other construction materials. It can transport large quantities of cargo in a single trip. Additionally, the unloading process is extremely fast, thus reducing the time required for unloading and loading.

sasiu_container.title: Container Chassis
sasiu_container.description: The container chassis is an essential piece in the transport industry, providing an efficient and safe solution for transporting containerized cargo. It is built to withstand heavy loads, with a loading capacity that varies depending on the chassis model.

containere.title: Containers
containere.description: Containerized transport is essential for many modern commercial operations. At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the importance of containerized transport and have specialized in managing this type of service. Whether we are talking about standard 20 or 40-foot containers, or those with special specifications – such as those for transporting hazardous or refrigerated goods – our team of professionals is prepared to manage any type of container.

cisterna_pentru_lichide.title: Tanker for Liquids
cisterna_pentru_lichide.description: Liquid transport represents a specific branch of the transport industry, which requires special attention and a specialized approach. Whether it is food, chemical substances, or other fluids, this type of transport demands high caution and precision. Crystal Logistics Services, through specially equipped tankers, ensures leak-proof and safe transport, essential for preserving the integrity and quality of the transported liquids.

marafa_lichida_cisterna.title: Liquid Cargo – Tanker
marafa_lichida_cisterna.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the complexity and sensitivity of transporting liquid cargo. These range from food products, such as wine or oil, to chemical or petroleum substances. Each of these requires a different level of attention and preparation, but we ensure the transport of liquids in safe and specialized containers.

platforma_pentru_transport_autoturisme.title: Platform for Car Transport
platforma_pentru_transport_autoturisme.description: We offer efficient solutions for the transport of individual or bulk lots of cars. Whether you need to transport a single vehicle or an entire lot, our platforms are ready to meet your requirements. Efficiency and cost-effectiveness are two of our main concerns, so you can save time and money without compromising the safety or integrity of the vehicles.

autoturisme_platforma_pentru_auto.title: Cars – Platform for CARS
autoturisme_platforma_pentru_auto.description: Car transport is a complex process that requires special attention at every stage, from loading to unloading. At Crystal Logistics Services, we use specialized platforms for car transport, which ensure secure fastening of the vehicles to prevent any movement during transport. Thus, the vehicles arrive at their destination in the same condition as when they were handed over.

camion_pentru_marfuri_periculoase.title: Truck for Hazardous Materials
camion_pentru_marfuri_periculoase.description: When we talk about hazardous materials, we refer to those materials or substances whose properties can endanger the health and security of people, as well as the environment during transport. The transport of these materials is regulated by the ADR regulation – a set of international rules that establish specific requirements for the packaging, labeling, and transport of these types of goods.

marfa_periculoasa_adr.title: Hazardous Materials (ADR)
marfa_periculoasa_adr.description: The transport of hazardous materials implies increased attention and a high level of expertise. At Crystal Logistics Services, we strictly comply with the international regulations in force. We ensure that every product is properly packaged, correctly labeled, and transported under maximum safety conditions. We implement strict procedures and use special equipment to protect both our employees and the transported goods.

camion_frigorific_frigo.title: Refrigerated Truck (REEFER)
camion_frigorific_frigo.description: In the world of transport and logistics, fleet adaptability is an essential aspect. At Crystal Logistics Services, we have taken this aspect into account and equipped our trucks with state-of-the-art refrigeration technology to be able to transport refrigerated or frozen goods. Thus, we manage to adapt to the requirements of each order, adjusting the temperature according to the specific nature of the load. This allows us to offer personalized solutions for each client, ensuring that the cargo arrives at its destination in optimal conditions.

marfa_frigorifica_frigo.title: Refrigerated/Frozen Cargo (REEFER)
marfa_frigorifica_frigo.description: Our specialized vehicles for refrigerated goods transport are equipped with superior thermal insulation technology and high-performance temperature control systems. Thus, we transport meat and meat products, dairy products, fruits, vegetables, pastry products, eggs, beverages, and others in excellent conditions, depending on the requirements of each load.

Accordion.title: Freight transport legislation
Accordion.intro: Under what conditions is the transport of goods carried out?

class1.title: Public road freight transport
class1.short: can be carried out by transport operators only by meeting certain conditions, including possessing the necessary documents:
listItems: certified copy of the transport license (ARR licenses and ARR certified copies);
transport document, so you can justify the transport before the State Inspectorate for Road Transport Control;
certificate regarding the vehicle's compliance with pollution and road safety standards;
international transport authorization (only for international transport).

class2.title: Romanian road transport operators can perform public road freight transport in international traffic:
listItems: only based on international transport authorizations issued by the competent authority;
in compliance with international agreements or conventions to which Romania is a party.

class3.title: Documents required for own account road transport:
listItems: certified copy of the own account transport certificate (ARR certified copies);
documents proving that the cargo is transported on own account.

card1.title: Full Truck Load - FTL
card1.description: FTL represents the ideal choice when you have a large volume of cargo that needs to be delivered quickly and efficiently. In this case, the truck is exclusively dedicated to your load. For this type of road transport, we offer an optimized route and delivery without delay.

card2.title: Groupage Regime - LTL
card2.description: The LTL service is designed for the transport of smaller volume goods that do not occupy the entire capacity of a truck. By combining cargo from multiple clients, we ensure you benefit from an advantageous price and timely delivery. The freight forwarding company Crystal Logistics Services offers reliable transport services, connecting companies with efficient solutions for the road transport of goods through the freight exchange.

cta.title: Do you need efficient and convenient transport?
messages: Choose Crystal Logistics Services for a wide range of transport solutions adapted to your needs! We offer road freight transport, refrigerated transport, LTL transport, bulk cargo transport, and many more.
Contact us today to find out more about our road transport rates and freight transport intermediation services!

section_1.title: Forwarding Company dedicated to carriers
paragraphs: Do you want to maximize the potential of your fleet?
At Crystal Logistics Services, we offer complete transport solutions, both for spot collaborations and long-term, per-kilometer contracts.
We are the reliable partner that ensures constancy, flexibility, and profitability!

section_2.title: Why choose Crystal Logistics Services for your transport partnership?
paragraphs: Crystal Logistics Services is more than a forwarding house – we are the partner you need to take your transport business to the next level.
With an experienced team and a vast client portfolio, we provide personalized solutions for your operational needs.
Whether you are looking for spot cargo or want to conclude a long-term, per-kilometer contract, we are your reliable solution.

Accordion.title: Benefits of collaboration with Crystal Logistics Services
Accordion.intro: Discover why more and more carriers choose Crystal Logistics to increase their efficiency and revenue. Join us and enjoy the advantages of a solid partnership.

class1.title: Access to thousands of cargoes, every day
paragraphs: Regardless of the size of your fleet, at Crystal Logistics you will always find available loads. Our vast client network allows us to offer you constant transport opportunities, both domestically and within the Community. Every day brings new collaboration opportunities for profitable transport, regardless of the type of cargo or destination.

Our cargo offers are updated in real-time, allowing you to make quick decisions and keep your trucks moving. Moreover, we don't just offer you access to thousands of cargoes, but we also provide you with our dedicated teams who will offer continuous support in carrying out each transport.

class2.title: Long-term tractionist collaboration contracts, paid per kilometer
paragraphs: If you are looking for financial stability and long-term collaboration, tractionist-type contracts are the ideal solution for you. At Crystal Logistics, we guarantee a minimum number of kilometers per month, which means constant and predictable revenue for your business.

This type of contract offers you flexibility in choosing routes and the type of transport – whether it is domestic transport, Round-Trip journeys, or Community transport, we ensure constant loads and fast payments for every kilometer traveled.

class3.title: Fast and guaranteed payments
paragraphs: One of the biggest benefits we offer our partner carriers is prompt and guaranteed payment. We understand how important a steady cash flow is for your business, and we are committed to ensuring this through fast and efficient payment terms.

At Crystal Logistics, you can count on us for punctual payments, regardless of the type of contract chosen. We handle all administrative aspects so you can focus on what matters most – the efficient operation of your fleet.

class4.title: Additional benefits and expense reimbursements
paragraphs: In collaboration with Crystal Logistics Services, you get not only fast and guaranteed payments but also multiple additional benefits. We offer attractive bonuses for supplementary loadings and unloadings, which can significantly increase the profit on every trip performed.
We also ensure that all expenses related to road tolls, bridges, ports, and authorizations are reimbursed by us, so you have no extra worries managing operational costs

class5.title: Semi-trailer rental for increased flexibility
paragraphs: Fleet expansion can be a costly process, but at Crystal Logistics Services, we offer you an efficient alternative – the possibility to rent semi-trailers when you need them. This way, you can respond quickly to market demand without making major initial investments.
Whether you need standard, mega, or refrigerated semi-trailers, we provide flexible and efficient solutions that will help you honor all orders, thus increasing your transport capacity.

class6.title: Dedicated 24/7 assistance and professional dispatch
paragraphs: Not only do we offer you access to thousands of cargoes and advantageous contracts, but we are also by your side throughout the transports, ensuring all trips run smoothly. Our team of dispatchers is available 24/7 to help you with any problem or question related to transport.
Whether you encounter difficulties on the route or need quick solutions for any unforeseen situation, our experienced dispatchers are always ready to intervene and offer the necessary support.

class7.title: Diesel cards – efficient solutions for reducing costs
paragraphs: Reducing operational expenses is a priority for every carrier, and Crystal Logistics Services helps you with this by offering diesel cards. These allow you to purchase fuel at preferential prices, thus reducing the costs you incur with every trip.
By using our diesel cards, you will be able to optimize your expenses and increase long-term profitability.

class8.title: Flexibility in choosing the type of transport
paragraphs: Another major advantage we offer is flexibility in choosing the type of transport. Whether you prefer Round-Trip journeys, or want to operate within the Community or domestically, at Crystal Logistics Services we offer varied and personalized options.
This flexibility allows you to adjust your fleet's activity according to market requirements and your operational capacity, thus maximizing efficiency and increasing revenue.

Accordion2.title: How does the collaboration contract with Crystal Logistics Services work?
Accordion2.intro: At Crystal Logistics, we offer carriers the flexibility to choose the contract type that suits them best, based on their preferences and business goals. We have three collaboration options, each with specific advantages and clear benefits, to ensure financial stability and constant revenue.

class_a.title: 1. Round-Trip (Import-Export) – Collaboration on international routes with guaranteed kilometers
class_a.short: Round-Trip transports involve international journeys where your trucks will travel between Romania and various countries in the European Union, as well as outside of it. These routes are ideal for those who want to obtain a combination of international and domestic trips, with significant advantages:
paragraphs: Included destinations:
Guaranteed kilometers:
Fast payments:
Additional benefits:
listItems: most EU countries, such as Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Netherlands, Belgium, Austria, Hungary, Bulgaria, Greece, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Croatia, Slovenia, but also non-EU countries: Switzerland (CH), Turkey (TR), United Kingdom (GB), Norway (NO).
We ensure a minimum number of kilometers every month, so you have the certainty that your fleet will have constant revenue.
You benefit from guaranteed, fast, and delay-free payments, ensuring solid financial stability.
Access to thousands of cargoes, bonuses for supplementary loadings, and reimbursement of operational expenses (road tolls, bridges, ports).

class_b.title: 2. Community – Exclusive international transport within European territory
class_b.short: Community-type collaboration is aimed at carriers who wish to operate exclusively on international routes, without returning to Romania for an extended period. This option is ideal for maximizing earnings and optimizing operations.
paragraphs: Collaboration duration:
Road tolls:
Highest earnings potential:
Stability and financial security:
listItems: 2 months of continuous transport within Europe, covering multiple countries and destinations.
Under this type of contract, Crystal Logistics separately pays all road tolls related to the transports, which significantly reduces your operational costs.
Community collaboration offers the highest earning potential, given the large number of kilometers traveled and the constant volumes of transported cargo.
In addition to fast and secure payments, we offer permanent assistance and 24/7 dispatch available, so you can concentrate on your trips without worries.

class_c.title: 3. Domestic – Exclusive national transport
class_c.short: For those who want to operate exclusively nationally, the Domestic collaboration type represents the simplest and most efficient solution. This allows you to focus on local routes, covering the transport demand across the entire territory of Romania.
paragraphs: Long-term stability:
Reduced operating costs:
Fast and efficient solutions:
listItems: We offer access to spot cargoes and national transport contracts, ensuring regular trips and constant revenue.
Being domestic transport, operational costs, including road tolls and supplementary expenses, are lower, which means a higher profit for every trip.
Through our extensive client network in Romania, your trucks will never stand idle without a load. We ensure efficient planning of trips, allowing you to optimize every day of operation.

cta.title: Collaborate with us and discover Crystal Logistics Services' personalized solutions!
messages: Do you want a stable and profitable partnership? At Crystal Logistics Services, we are dedicated to your success.

section_1.title: Worry-free international removals with Crystal Logistics Services

Our qualified personnel are well-trained and have extensive experience in transport and logistics, so they can assist you at every stage of the relocation process.

section_3.title: Loading Personal Effects
paragraphs: We have a team of professionals with experience in handling and loading goods.
Upon request, you can benefit from our loading and unloading services.

Our warehouses are equipped with ultra-modern security systems, and storage conditions are rigorously controlled to maintain optimal parameters.

section_5.title: Safe Transport
paragraphs: At Crystal Logistics Services, we pride ourselves on our modern and reliable fleet.
This includes a variety of transport vehicles, from freight trucks to specialized vehicles for the transport of fragile goods.

section_6.title: Unloading at Destination
paragraphs: Our international removals service includes the transport of your goods.

section_7.title: Relocation Experts: we guide you every step of the way
paragraphs: We understand that relocation can be a complex and stressful process, which is why we offer professional consulting to ensure a smooth and efficient transition.
Our consultants will guide you from the beginning, offering advice and assistance at every stage of planning.
Crystal Logistics is a reliable international freight forwarding company with vast experience in organizing and managing relocations of any complexity.

section_8.title: Dedication and Experience
paragraphs: Choosing the right partner for your international relocation is an important decision, and Crystal Logistics has everything you need to make this process simple and efficient.

We understand that moving is a stressful time, which is why we have developed a transparent system that allows you to understand every stage of the process. Whether it's road transport, air transport, storage, or unloading, we detail all the services we offer, so you can trust that your goods are in safe hands.

section_9.title: Faster and more efficient international removals with Crystal Logistics Services
paragraphs: We are by your side every step of the international relocation process, whether you are moving thousands of kilometers away or just a few borders.
We have the experience, knowledge, and resources necessary to make every move a positive experience.
Choose efficiency, choose quality, choose Crystal Logistics Services!

Accordion.title: Stages of a successful international removal

class1.title: 1. Quotation Process
paragraphs: This process involves evaluating and determining the cost of transporting your goods. Factors such as distance, weight, and volume of goods, as well as any special requirements you have, are taken into account.
This process is essential to provide you with a realistic and transparent estimated cost.

class2.title: 2. Planning and Coordination
paragraphs: This stage involves organizing the logistical details of the move. Crystal Logistics Services can help you with careful planning and efficient coordination to ensure a smooth move.

class3.title: 3. Packing the Goods
paragraphs: This step is essential to ensure that your goods arrive safely at their destination.

class4.title: 4. Transport
paragraphs: This is the central point of your international move. We will inform you about the estimated transit time and how potential issues or delays are managed.

class5.title: 5. Unloading
paragraphs: The final stage is unloading and installation at the new location.

Header.title: OTHER SERVICES
Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: Warehousing and Handling
paragraphs: We collaborate with an extended network of partners to offer integrated warehousing and handling solutions. We understand that each of our clients has unique needs and the specifics of their business may require a specialized approach. Therefore, we have built our partner network carefully, to ensure we can meet a wide range of requirements.

Our partners' warehouses are equipped with the latest technologies, ensuring your products are kept in optimal conditions. Handling services are performed by qualified specialists, guaranteeing proper handling and safe delivery of your goods.
Thus, regardless of the type of cargo – from perishable products to technological equipment or construction materials – we can ensure adequate handling, without compromising product integrity.

section_2.title: Cargo Insurance
paragraphs: We understand that every business is unique and has specific needs. That's why, in collaboration with our network of specialized partners, we offer personalized cargo insurance services, to perfectly match your requirements.
Whether we are talking about insurance for various types of cargo, for domestic or international transport, or for hazardous materials, we are here to offer you the right solution.
Our goal is to protect your investment and give you the peace of mind you need, knowing that your goods are covered against unforeseen events.

section_3.title: Customs Services
paragraphs: Customs procedures can be complex and stressful, involving a series of regulations and taxes that must be strictly adhered to in order to ensure the legal and efficient transport of goods.

Crystal Logistics offers you the complete solution for managing customs procedures, simplifying this process and eliminating the worry of documentation. We offer consulting for the correct preparation of import/export customs declarations, transit documents, and any other necessary documents.

With the help of our specialized partners, we ensure that your goods transit quickly and without impediments. We consider both freight transport and the entire legislation for goods transport, ensuring that every aspect is covered.

section_4.title: ASSISTANCE WITH LOADING AND UNLOADING
paragraphs: We handle the efficient and safe loading of your goods, whether it is furniture, home appliances, boxes, or other cargo.
We carefully transport your goods to the desired location and unload them with attention, ensuring their integrity.

card1.title: MANUAL
descriptions: our team will manually handle your goods

card2.title: WITH ELEVATOR

card4.title: WITH FORKLIFT
descriptions: the forklift is ideal for transporting palletized or stacked goods, saving time and effort.

section_1.title: INTERNATIONAL MILITARY AND STRATEGIC CARGO TRANSPORT

We ensure safe deliveries, ADR consulting, specialized customs services, secured military storage, and complete support for any type of special logistics transport or military cargo transport.

Crystal Logistics Services offers specialized military transport services, adapted to the most demanding standards. With an extensive logistics network and authorized partners, we ensure safe transports in compliance with international legislation in force.

section_2.title: WHY CHOOSE US?
paragraphs: Regardless of the nature of the load, we offer complete logistics solutions for strategic products and military equipment:

Our partnerships include structures from the defense industry, manufacturers, importers, and public authorities, and our extensive experience in special logistics transport and military cargo transport guarantees safe, on-time deliveries in full compliance with all national and international protocols.

Regardless of the nature of the load – armaments, tactical equipment, armored vehicles, military equipment, military technology, classified equipment, sensitive components, strategic products, dual-use items, hazardous materials, ammunition, or explosives – we offer complete military transport and international military transport logistics solutions, compliant with the strictest European and NATO regulations.

section_3.title: International Military Transport and Specialized Logistics Solutions
paragraphs: Crystal Logistics Services is your reliable partner for international military transport and specialized military logistics.

We are experts in managing the military transport of military equipment, armaments, ammunition, military technology, armored vehicles, and dual-use items. With a team of professionals and an extensive logistics network, Crystal Logistics Services ensures safe transports in compliance with international regulations in force, respecting all legal requirements for hazardous materials, including ADR Class 1 and explosives.

Within military logistics, we offer complete solutions for the transport of armaments and military equipment, including armored vehicles, tanks, armored cars, self-propelled guns, and defense drones. Every transport is monitored 24/7 and managed under maximum safety conditions, to guarantee safe deliveries in compliance with international regulations. We ensure that military equipment is protected during transport and delivery, using the most advanced military storage solutions and multimodal solutions to cover all the logistical needs of our clients.

section_4.title: Advanced Military Transport Services for Sensitive Equipment
paragraphs: We are authorized for the handling and military transport of sensitive cargo, including classified equipment, dual-use items, hazardous materials, explosives, ammunition, armaments, and other strategic products intended for the defense industry. We offer specialized international military transport services, in accordance with NATO, EU, and international legislation in force.

We provide door-to-door military cargo transport, utilizing multimodal solutions and a fleet adapted for military technology, military equipment, and armored vehicles, along with authorized escort, ADR consulting, documentary assistance, customs services, and dedicated support in relations with national and international authorities.

We precisely manage deliveries to military bases, strategic zones, special regime production facilities, and other sensitive locations, including secured military storage for all types of equipment, including tactical equipment and classified components. We adhere to the highest standards of confidentiality, operational security, and special logistics transport, offering our clients safe, fast, and compliant deliveries, regardless of the mission's complexity.

section_2.title: Advantages of Rail Transport
listItems: Rail freight transport has a low environmental impact. Trains emit fewer greenhouse gases and air pollutants per unit of freight transported, making them a more ecological choice.
Trains can transport a large number of freight units over long distances with significantly higher energy efficiency than other transport methods.
Rail transport is one of the safest modes of transport, with extremely rare accidents.
Delivering a container by rail can be much more economical than by other transport methods, especially over long distances.
The solid rail infrastructure also ensures a shorter transit time. Rail transport benefits from an extensive network of routes, meaning your goods can reach their destination faster.

Header.alt: Oversized Transport Banner - Crystal Logistics Services

section_1.title: Safe and On-Time Deliveries
paragraphs: From standard containers to temperature-controlled ones, from deliveries at origin to door-to-door, we offer personalized solutions to help you successfully complete your sea freight transport projects.

Accordion.title: Types of sea freight transport
Accordion.intro: At Crystal Logistics Services, we offer a wide range of sea freight transport services to meet your specific needs.

class1.title: Less-than-Container-Load (LCL) Sea Transport
paragraphs: Less-than-Container-Load (LCL) sea transport offered by Crystal Logistics Services is the ideal solution for companies that do not need to fill an entire container with cargo.
Whether you are sending a small or complex load, we offer personalized LCL solutions to meet your needs. We collaborate with reliable partners worldwide to guarantee a high-quality service.

class2.title: Full-Container-Load (FCL)
paragraphs: We handle the transport of sea containers loaded with cargo from a single shipper to a single consignee. At Crystal Logistics Services, we are committed to providing a high-quality FCL service, adapted to the needs of each client.
Our vast experience in managing sea transport allows us to offer personalized solutions, regardless of the specific nature of the cargo or the logistical complexity.

class3.title: Refrigerated transport
paragraphs: A wide range of products require this type of transport, whether we are talking about frozen or refrigerated food products, fresh flowers, beauty products, or pharmaceuticals.
For this reason, we have adapted our sea services to be able to manage the impressive diversity of cargo that requires controlled temperatures during transport.

class4.title: FCL solutions for cross-trade transport
paragraphs: We offer pre-carriage and on-carriage services that ensure a smooth and safe transport of your cargo from the point of origin to the destination.

These services include all the necessary stages to transport your goods, starting with loading, transport to the port, and loading onto the transport vessel, up to unloading at the destination port and final transport to your location.
At destination ports, we offer warehousing solutions upon request that provide you with security and flexibility.

standard.title: STANDARD
standard.description: It is a rectangular, metallic container with standardized dimensions, designed to be transported safely and efficiently through various modes of transport: ship, train, and truck.

openTop.title: OPEN TOP
openTop.description: Similar to Standard containers, but with an open top. Tarpaulins allow easy loading and unloading of bulky or unconventional cargo.

flatRack.title: FLAT RACK
flatRack.description: They have no side or top walls, only a basic frame and corner posts. They allow the transport of voluminous cargo that exceeds standard container dimensions.

reefer.title: REEFER
reefer.description: Equipped with refrigeration and heating systems to maintain a controlled temperature. Used for transporting perishable goods, such as food, medicine, chemical products, etc.

highCube.title: HIGH CUBE
highCube.description: They have a greater height than Standard containers, offering supplementary loading space. Ideal for transporting voluminous cargo with low weight.

worldServices.title: We offer sea freight transport services worldwide!
worldServices.description: CSL solutions are personalized, adapted to the type of cargo and the international context. Our sea freight transport services are flexible and complete:

left: Full Container Load (FCL) and Less-than-Container-Load (LCL) transport;
door-to-door services, from picking up the cargo from your location to delivering it to the destination;

section_2.title: What is multimodal transport?
introParagraphs: Multimodal transport is a transport system that combines two or more different modes of transport to transport goods from one point to another.
This type of transport can include different combinations of road, sea, air, or rail transport, depending on the specific needs of clients and the available infrastructure.

groups.text: The cargo is initially transported by truck from the production location to a port.
There, it is loaded onto a sea container and transported by sea to another port.
Upon arrival, the cargo is unloaded and transported by train to the final destination.

section_3.title: Air transport
